verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O gladsome Light, O Grace of God the Father's face, th'eternal splendor wearing; celestial, holy, blest, our Savior Jesus Christ, joyful in Thine appearing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Now, as day fadeth quite we see the evening light, our wonted hymn outpouring; Father of might unknown, Thee, His incarnate Son, and Holy Ghost adoring.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: To Thee of right belongs all praise of holy songs, O Son of God, Life-giver; Thee, therefore, O Most High, the world does glorify and shall exalt forever.
